label: 12. What are the major threats and challenges for the ICCA if any? (Please only select up to three)
helperText: For example, threats to the ICCA’s continued existence, or to its biodiversity.

options.label: Decline in quality or quantity of biodiversity or nature (e.g., clean water and air, healthy soil)
Extraction (e.g., hunting, mining, logging or fishing)
Climate change (e.g., rapidly changing temperature and precipitation patterns, sea level rise, extreme weather events)
Over-harvesting (specify if from within or outside the community)
Inappropriate management (e.g., management approaches or practices that are detrimental to the ICCA’s biodiversity or other values)
Other (please describe under the final question)
